attributes.action: David lammy to stand down for being against democracy
attributes.background: Trying to take away the publics result on referendum so should stand down as we don't live in dictatorship. Saying we voted out and the government should over turn the publics wishes which basically ends democracy and freedom of choice which is unprofessional in his job.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
